text:
@realDonaldTrump @FoxNews @CNN @OANN @newsmax So...
Americans are dying.
You’re playing golf.
No stance on the civil rights movement.
No effort to competently (look it up) address the coronavirus. 
You take NO responsibility. 
You have time to review ratings and polls. 
Ah, now I see!  THIS is why you can’t be president. https://t.co/Pu67fZVEsy
